![](https://bandithost.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/BH-01.png)
**What's the deal?**
Well, we're giving away a few VPSes. 
Once those are gone, we'll have a few other deals as well.

**What's the catch?**
No catch, don't be a jerk and don't do anything illegal.
Some feedback would be nice, what sort of products/deals you'd like to see.

**Where's the deals?**
Here's what we've got for you.

**XS-NVMe-VPS**
1 CPU Core
1 GB Ram
10 GB NVMe Disk
1 TB Bandwidth
1 IPv4
